remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownEventArgs> is used when the user clicks a button on a control that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownEventArgs> contains information on which button was clicked.
